cookie.title: SmartThings Find Login (Manual)
cookie.description: Log in to smartthingsfind.samsung.com in your browser, then open DevTools → Network → chkLogin.do, and copy **Request Headers → Cookie:** line here.

error.missing_jsessionid: JSESSIONID not found. Paste the whole Cookie header from chkLogin.do request.
error.auth_failed: Cookie is not valid. Paste the whole Cookie header from chkLogin.do request.

data.active_mode_smarttags: Use active mode for SmartTags (may increase battery consumption).
data.active_mode_others: Use active mode for other devices (phones, watches, ...) (high battery consumption).
